You are my wife. Out of my affection and love for you, I intend to give you some immovable property free of charge, and in return for my love, I have this settlement deed to transfer to you the immovable property listed in the schedule below, which has been my ancestral property and has been in my complete possession till today, along with all the rights I have, water, funds, common water ways, common roads, easement rights, etc., free of charge, and I hereby grant you possession of the property listed in the schedule below, together with all the rights I have. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full rightful owner and shall pay all taxes due to the Government and shall enjoy the property freely and freely as you wish, with full rights of gift and sale, for the benefit of your children and grandchildren.
In this regard, I, my heirs, and I, whatever may arise from any hindrances, encumbrances, or obstacles, I will resolve them all for you and your heirs at our own expense and implement the Scheduled Property in this manner without interruption.
This settlement deed is written in your name, making you believe and believe that this property is an undisputed and unalienable property to which no other person has previously made any mortgages, purchases, purchase agreements, leases, guarantees, etc. There are no other male or female heirs or beneficiaries of this property except me. This property has not been assigned under Government Act No. 9/77. Accordingly, the deeds are filed for the registration of this property in your name. H. Ravi Hones
M.

You are my wife. Out of my affection and love for you, I intend to give you some immovable property free of charge, and in return for my love, I have this settlement deed to transfer to you the immovable property listed in the schedule below, which has been my ancestral property and has been in my complete possession till today, along with all the rights I have, water, funds, common water ways, common roads, easement rights, etc., free of charge, and I hereby grant you possession of the property listed in the schedule below, together with all the rights I have. Therefore, from now on, you shall be the full rightful owner of the property and shall pay all taxes due to the Government and shall enjoy it freely and freely, as you wish, with full rights of gift, sale, and inheritance. In this regard, I, my heirs, and I will resolve all the feudal encumbrances, whenever and wherever they arise, for you and your heirs, at our own expense, and we will continue to implement the Scheduled Property in this manner without interruption. This property is an undisputed property, free from any encumbrances, mortgages, purchase agreements, leases, guarantees, etc., and this settlement deed is written and given in your name, making you believe and believe that this property is an undisputed property, free from any encumbrances such as mortgages, purchases, purchase agreements, leases, guarantees, etc., by others.
There are no other male or female heirs or beneficiaries of this property except me. This property has not been assigned under this Government Act No. 9/77. Accordingly, the agreements are filed for the registration of this property in your name.
M. Ravi touch#13 1

I have furnished all the necessary details such as title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents of the property to the undersigned. I hereby declare that I have not transferred/alienated/registered the property in this deed to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me. The Sub-Registrar, his office staff and the draftsman shall not have any relation or responsibility in connection with this settlement deed written and registered today. I hereby declare that I can, if necessary, issue an amendment/agreement/additional document(s) to this document without any delay or compensation from the undersigned. I have personally examined and shown to the experts all the necessary details such as the title deeds, encumbrance certificate and identity documents of the undersigned and have verified the truth of the said items and have registered this deed from the undersigned. Therefore, I hereby declare that I am fully responsible for all the transactions relating to this property.
The Sub-Registrar, his office staff and the draftsman shall not have any relation or responsibility in relation to this settlement deed written and registered today. This deed has been prepared and registered only on the basis of the details furnished by me.

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: G.RAGAMPETA/ALL(2-0) W-B: 2-0SURVEY: 504HOUSE: 2-83EXTENT:69.65SQ.Yds BUILT:0SQ. FT Boundires:[N]: ft 30.4dondakayalaveerababu house[S] ft 30.4 otherssite [E]: ft 20.8 road[W]: ft 20.8sailakshmi house

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 568 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Motupalli Ravi Somesh, in favour of his Wife, Motupalli Satya, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 69.65 Sq. Yds., Located Nearby House No. 2-83, comprised in survey number 504, situated in G.Ragampeta Village & Grama Panchayati, Peddapuram Mandal, within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Kovvur, is bounded as follows:

North by: Ft 30.4 Dondakayala Veerababu House
South by: Ft 30.4 Others Site
East by: Ft 20.8 Road
West by: Ft 20.8 Sailakshmi House
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the scheduled property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
